searchParameters.q: Seattle Children's Hospital address contact site

knowledgeGraph.title: Seattle Children's Hospital
knowledgeGraph.description: Seattle Children's is a children's hospital in the Laurelhurst neighborhood of Seattle, Washington, United States. The hospital specializes in the care of infants, children, teens, and young adults aged 0–21 in several specialties.

attributes.Address: 4800 Sand Point Way NE, Seattle, WA 98105
